ovdesc.p: This is an internal file which holds average balance information for accounts and contract for use within the Management Information.

In addition, the refinancing information is held on here, as defined on the MI.PARAMETER "SYSTEM" record - and this information is used in the creation of cost of funds entries on the MI.COF.ENTRIES file.
Records on this file are produced and updated from the REBUILD.BAL.MVMT infromation, and information regarding run dates and the retention of the data is held on the MI.DATES file.

The key to the BALANCE.MOVEMENT records.
The key to this file is composed of up to three parts, separated by a '*'
a) Contract ID - The transaction reference or account number to which the BALANCE.MOVEMENT record refers to. For Securities, the key of the SC.TRADING.POSITION record is held in this field.

The multivalue associated group of fields TXN.CODE to TXN.AMT.TOTAL contain the number of entries and the total amount of entries with each different Transaction Code which have been processed during the month specified in ID field. The group is repeated for each different Transaction Code.
